loans.name: Ruby Ortega Porto

texts.es: Ruby invirtió su credikiva en  queso, productos de queso y accesorios que tenía encargados, así fue como respondió a su clientela y esto  la dejó satisfecha. Así mismo compró insumos y preparó hayacas, tamales y  productos fritos que vendió y ganó algún dinero.. En la actualidad está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva, con el cual comprará bolsos y productos típicos alimenticios encargados,  traídos desde Sincelejo, ciudad costera de Colombia, pues ellos son los me que mas rotan y tienen una buena demanda y Ruby aspira a  aumentar  su volumen de ventas y en consecuencia su utilidad. Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente: “Mis agradecimientos por el apoyo recibido y que me sigan apoyando, para poder seguir en mi negocio. “
texts.en: Ruby invested her Kiva loan in cheese, other foods made with cheese and incidental items for which she had client orders. In this way, she responded to her clients' demand, which left her feeling satisfied. She also purchased ingredients and prepared hayacas (a tamale-like food common in Colombia), tamales and fried foods that she sold to earn additional income. Currently she is applying for a new Kiva loan, with which she will buy bags as well as local and regional specialty foods for which she has orders. She will bring the products from Sincelejo, a coastal city in Colombia. She says these are the products that sell most quickly and for which she has a good demand. Ruby aspires to increase the volume of her sales and her usefulness to her clients. Her message to Kiva lenders is the following:"My thanks for the support I have received from you. Please continue to support me, so that I am able to continue growing my business."

loans.use: to buy bags and local and regional specialty food products.

loans.name: Nenita Diaz

texts.en:
Nenita is 50 years old and a widow with five children.

Nenita works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29500 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell in her general store.

Nenita has borrowed and repaid 18 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 12 years and also earns an income from E-loading.

Nenita aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Everlyn Caballero

texts.en:
Everlyn is 43 years old and married with 5 children.

Everlyn works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 26,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.

Everlyn has borrowed and repaid 13 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 12 years and also earns an income from selling frozen foods.

Everlyn aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Jovelyn

texts.en:
Jovelyn is from Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. She is 23 years old. Jovelyn is married and has a child.

To make a living, Jovelyn owns and operates a bicycle transport service. (A bicycle is a bike with a passenger cab.) Jovelyn has been engaged in her business for 2 years and earns 1,000 PHP a month for these activities.

Jovelyn is requesting a loan of 4,000 PHP, which will be used to pay for the cost paid in maintenance and repair of her bicycle.

In 2011, Jovelyn joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to pay for the cost paid for maintenance and repair of her bicycle

location.town: Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Maria Manuela

texts.es:
María Manuela tiene 45 años de edad es viuda tiene cuatro hijos,  vive con los hijos en Guaranda Provincia Bolívar.

Es Integrante de la VRC MUSHUC ÑAN está ubicada en la comunidad Guanto Cruz parroquia Guanujo a 60 minutos de la oficina conformada por 11 socios y socias se dedica a las labores agrícolas en cultivo de mora, maíz, cría de animales de corral y vacas lecheras para la elaboración de quesos. 

María Manuela se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de mora, maíz, papas, cebolla, trigo, además se dedica a la cría de pollos, cerdos, borregos, ganado.  Solicita el crédito para comprar el urea, insecticidas, líquidos mata montes, herbicidas.

 Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los insumos y mejorar los cultivos. El sueño es tener una casa bien terminada. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es el mal clima y el transporte.
En el tiempo libre le gusta tejer, jugar con los nietos y disfrutar de la época del carnaval.
texts.en:
María Manuela is 45 years old. She is a widow and she has four children. She lives with her children in Guaranda, Bolívar province.
 She is a member of the "Mushuc Ñan" communal bank which is located in the community of Guanto Cruz, Guanujo parish. It is 60 minutes from the office. The communal bank has 11 members who farm blackberries and corn as well as raise livestock and dairy cows for making cheeses.
María Manuela is a blackberry, corn, potato, onion and wheat farmer. She also raises chickens, pigs, sheep and livestock. She is requesting a loan to purchase urea, insecticides, liquid weed killers and herbicides. 
With the help of this loan, she will be able to buy the supplies and improve her crops. Her dream is to have a well-built house. The challenges she faces are bad weather and transportation. 
In her free time, she likes to weave, play with her grandchildren and enjoy Carnival season.

loans.use: urea, insecticides, liquid weed killers and herbicides.

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en:
Jennifer is a single mother of four, on a mission to make a positive change in her community and on her budget. The 32-year-old owns "Klassy Kidzs Resale and Things", a Sainte Genevieve resale shop with an inventory of newly-purchased, name-brand items. “I don’t sell junk,” Jennifer says. Her store carries clothing for sizes between newborn and young men's pant size 36, along with a variety of educational toys, furniture and accessories, such as the $90 Jessica Simpson shoes she’ll sell for $25. Some items are from her closet that her children never used or wore, or used and wore a couple of times; all without rips, stains and scratches. Nothing in Jennifer’s shop is donated except for prom dresses she receives from the community. Jennifer is networking with a community school district to donate the dresses to deserving high school students. She plans to do this annually.

With a business plan in mind, Jennifer called St. Louis’ directory assistance, which then connected her to Missouri’s directory assistance and informed her of ACCION Texas, Inc.’s newest location. Soon after, she applied online and was approved for the first ACCION loan of Missouri. Since then, she referred two friends to ACCION.

“I don’t want to have a boss,” Jennifer says. Instead of making money for someone else with her knowledge and skill, she says, “I’d rather be the one making money.” This pushed Jennifer to open her shop as she did on March 6. She is the only worker at the moment and she plans to keep it that way. This adheres to her plan of working for herself and making her own money.

The ACCION loan helped Jennifer pay for unexpected expenses, such as rent, the store’s deposit, a cash register, checkout counter, sales racks and advertisement. Jennifer’s children, ranging between 14 and five months, were her inspiration to open her shop. She says the ACCION loan “actually helped me open something that’ll help my community and achieve something I actually want to do.”

loans.use: to pay for a cash register, checkout desk and inventory

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en: Rosita is from Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. She is 64 years old. Rosita is widowed and has nine children. To make a living, Rosita owns and operates a retail store, selling animal feed and farm-related products. Rosita has been in her business for three years and earns 2,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) a month for these activities. In 2011, Rosita joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. Rosita is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional products like a table and a carving knife for sale. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional products like a table and a carving knife for sale.

loans.name: Adelia

texts.en:
Adelia is 30 years old and married.

Adelia runs a sari-sari (variety) store in the Philippines and requested a 29,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) loan through NWTF to buy items to sell in her sari-sari store.

Adelia has been in this business for 12 years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, detergent and other groceries. 

In the future, Adelia would like to save money to expand the business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell in her sari-sari (variety) store.

loans.name: Mercedes Obidas

texts.en:
Mercedes is 60 years old and married with three children.

Mercedes works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 30,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.

Mercedes has borrowed and repaid 22 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 14 years and also earns an income from farming rice.

Mercedes aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: To purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Fifame Group

texts.fr: FIFAME est un groupe de trois personnes, dont les membres vendent dans le même marché. La représentante du groupe, Suzanne (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 30 ans. Suzanne est mariée à un certain Nicolas. Le couple a deux enfants, dont un est scolarisé et tous à leur charge. Le couple assure ensemble les charges de la maison. Depuis vingt ans, Suzanne mène comme activité la vente de riz, des condiments et de façon secondaire la vente de cartes de recharges téléphoniques dans un marché du Benin. Suzanne s’approvisionne dans un marché du Benin. C’est la première fois que Suzanne sollicite un crédit auprès de ALIDé, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe FIFAME. Ce crédit leur permettra de renforcer leurs activités et de mieux répondre aux exigences de leur clientèle.
texts.en:
FIFAME is a group of three persons whose members sell at the same market. The group's representative, Suzanne (whose hand is raised in the photo), is 30 years old and married to a man named Nicolas. They have two children, of whom one is in school and in their care. The couple jointly ensure the household expenses are covered.

For twenty years, Suzanne has had a business selling rice and condiments, and on the side, she sells mobile phone recharge cards at a market in Benin. She gets her supplies from a market in Benin.

This is the first time that Suzanne has requested a loan from ALIDé, along with the other members of the group FIFAME. This loan will enable them to bolster their businesses and to respond better to the requirements of their customers.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice, some condiments, and mobile phone cards

loans.name: Sena Group

texts.fr: SENA est un groupe de trois personnes, dont les membres vivent dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe Moulikatou (qui a la main levée sur la photo) est âgée 33 ans. Moulikatou est mariée à un certain Angelo. Le couple a deux enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Moulikatou vit ensemble avec ses enfants et son mari et assure avec son mari les charges de la maison. Moulikatou a appris la coiffure et exerce ce métier depuis quatre ans dans une ville du Benin. Parallèlement à ce métier, Moulikatou vend des mèches et des produits cosmétiques. Moulikatou s'approvisionne dans un marché du Benin. Dans le but de renforcer son activité et de satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle, Moulikatou s’est associée avec les autres membres du groupe SENA pour consentir un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Le premier crédit reçu a été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
SENA is a group of three persons whose members live in the same district. The group's representative, Moulikatou (whose hand is raised in the photo), is 33 years old and married to a man named Angelo. They have two children, both in school and in their care. Moulikatou lives together with her children and husband and ensures, along with her husband, that the household expenses are covered.

Moulikatou learned how to style hair and has been in this trade for four years in a city in Benin. Concurrent to this trade, she sells hair extensions and cosmetics. She gets her supplies  from a market in Benin. 

With the  goal of bolstering her business and satisfying customer demand, Moulikatou joined with the other members of the group SENA to agree to a second loan from ALIDé. The first loan received was indeed paid back.

loans.use: to buy hair extensions and cosmetic products

loans.name: Juan Antonio Muñoz Mudoz

texts.es: Juan compró materias primas y preparó productos de panadería que vendió y esto le genera satisfacción. En la actualidad se prepara para un nuevo credikiva, el cual planea invertir  en materias primas, pues comprará harina, azúcar, grasa, mantequilla, en mayor volumen y con ello aumentará su producción  de productos y los venderá como dice e adagio. “como pan caliente” , para indicar que la rotación es rápida. Su éxito radica en la ubicación de su local en un punto estratégicamente comercial. Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente: “Gracias por el apoyo recibido y la manera de retribuirles es con el pago puntual del crédito”
texts.en: With his last Kiva loan, Juan bought raw materials and prepared baked goods that he then sold, which gave him a feeling of satisfaction. Currently he is applying for a new Kiva loan, which he will invest in raw materials. He will buy flour, sugar, lard and butter in larger quantities. With these larger quantities he will increase his production of baked goods and will sell them just as the adage says: "like hot bread", meaning that they will sell quickly. His success comes from the location of his bakery in a strategically placed commercial area. His message to the Kiva lenders is the following: "Thanks for the support I have received. My way of returning your help is by punctually repaying the loan."

loans.use: to buy large quantities of flour, sugar, lard and butter.

loans.name: Ana Hilda

texts.es:
Ana, se dedica al negocio de hamburguesas y hot dog, ella vive con su hija de 17 años de edad, es madre soltera, ella comenzó el negocio hace 15 años, como empleada, luego se decidió por comprar el carrito donde venden y el mobiliario, y continúo brindando el servicio de comida rápida frente a una universidad.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de carnes, pollo, pan, aderezos, tomates, lechuga, pepino, ayudándole para mantener el negocio bien surtido, para estar preparada para atender la demanda de los clientes.
El objetivo de Ana es que sus clientes se mantengan satisfechos con los productos que ofrece, comprar más sillas y mesas para mejorar el negocio, y apoyar a su hija en sus estudios.
texts.en:
Ana sells hamburgers and hotdogs.  She lives with her 17 year old daughter; she’s a single mother.  She started the business 15 years ago as an employee but then decided to buy the food cart and the furniture thus continuing to offer fast food service across from a university.  

She requests the loan to buy meats, chicken, bread, dressings, tomatoes, lettuce and cucumber to help her keep her keep the business well-stocked and be prepared to meet customer demand.

Ana’s objective is that they remain satisfied with the products she offers, to buy more tables and chairs to improve the business and to support her daughter’s studies.

loans.use: to buy meats, chicken, bread, dressings, tomatoes, lettuce and cucumber.

loans.name: Erenea Ambo

texts.en:
Erenea is 72 years old and married with eight children.

Erenea works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 25,000 peso loan through NWTF to buy additional stock to sell.

Erenea has borrowed and repaid 17 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns an income from fishing.

Erenea aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy additional stock to sell.

loans.name: Nonvidokpo Group

texts.fr: Le groupe NONVIDOKPO est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. C'est la deuxième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de leur activité. La  représentante du groupe, du nom de Léonie est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Léonie est âgée de 29 ans et est mariée à un mécanicien du nom de Augustin. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Léonie vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Les diverses charges de la maison sont assurées par le couple. Pour y parvenir, Léonie vend des condiments de façon ambulante depuis près de cinq ans. Léonie s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Léonie sollicite, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe NONVIDOKPO, un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Le premier crédit reçu a été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
The group NONVIDOKPO comprises three persons who reside in the same district. This is the second time this group has requested financial aid from ALIDé for boosting their business. The group's representative, Léonie, is the one in the photo with her hand raised. She is 29 years old and married to a mechanic named Augustin. They have three children, all in school and in their care. Léonie lives together with her husband and children. 

The diverse household expenses are covered by the couple. To achieve this, Léonie has been selling condiments door to door for nearly five years. She gets her supplies from a market in Benin. 

Seeking to satisfy her customers and to increase her sales and her revenues, Léonie is requesting, along with the other members of the group NONVIDOKPO, a second loan from ALIDé. The first loan receive was indeed paid back.

loans.use: to buy condiments

loans.name: Blanca Yanira

texts.es:
Blanca, se dedica a la venta de pupusas y productos lácteos, vive con su familia, su esposo y una hija, ella inicio el negocio por iniciativa propia, trabaja en su casa, no tiene un horario establecido para realizar la venta. 
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de quesillo, crema, cuajada, maíz, aceite, condimentos, chicharrón, con esto lograra surtir sus negocios y tener disponibilidad para la producción y venta.
La aspiración de Blanca es tener un negocio exitoso, con muchos clientes, y poco a poco estabilizarse con sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Blanca sells pupusas [stuffed grilled corn cakes] and dairy products.  She lives with her family, her husband and daughter.  She started the business on her own initiative and works at home; she doesn’t have a fixed schedule for her sales.

She’s asking for a loan to buy string cheese, cream, curd, corn, oil, condiments and fried pork.  She will manage to stock her businesses with this and have supplies available for production and sales.

Blanca’s hope is to have a successful business with many customers and gradually become stable with profits.

loans.use: to buy string cheese, cream, curd, corn, oil and condiments.

loans.name: Ste Trinite Gbenonkpo Group

texts.fr: STE TRINITE GBENONKPO est un groupe constitué de quatre personnes qui résident dans le même quartier et dont la présidente (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) se nomme Kikè Julienne. Dans le but d’augmenter leur fonds de roulement, ce groupe sollicite pour la première fois, un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Kikè Julienne est âgée 35 ans et est mariée à Thierry, un cuisinier. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Kikè Julienne vit ensemble avec ses enfants et son mari et assure avec son mari les charges de la maison. Kikè Julienne n’a jamais été à l’école. Pour satisfaire ses besoins et ceux de sa famille, Kikè Julienne vend des cartes de recharges téléphoniques et du maïs dans sa région depuis près de huit ans. Kikè Julienne s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Ce premier prêt permettra certainement à Kikè Julienne et à son groupe STE TRINITE GBENONKPO, de rehausser le niveau de leur activité et d’accroître leur clientèle et leur revenu.
texts.en:
STE TRINITE GBENONKPO is a group composed of four persons who reside in the same district and whose president (the one in the photo with her hand raised) is called Kikè Julienne. With the goal of increase its working capital, this group is requesting a loan for the first time from ALIDé. 

Kikè Julienne is 35 years old and married to Thierry, a cook. The couple have three children, all in school and in their care. Kikè Julienne lives together with her children and husband and ensures, along with her husband, that the household expenses are covered.

To meet the needs of the family, Kikè Julienne has been selling mobile phone recharge cards and corn in her region for nearly eight years. She gets her supplies from a market in Benin. 

This initial loan will surely enable Kikè Julienne and her group STE TRINITE GBENONKPO to boost their business and to increase their customer base and their revenues.

loans.use: to buy sacks of corn and phone recharge cards

loans.name: Estela Blanca

texts.es:
Estela, se dedica a la venta de enchape y lociones, ella tiene 36 años de edad, está casada tiene tres hijos, uno de ellos está estudiando en la universidad y le ayuda a la venta, los otros son menores de edad aun están en la escuela. El negocio lo inicio hace 5 años, trabaja a través de catálogos y lo realiza de lunes a viernes.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de joyas como pulseras, aretes, cadenas y lociones, esta compra le ayudara para incrementar su inventario y obtener mejores ingresos, ya que comprara al por mayor y obtendrá un mejor precio.
El objetivo de Estela es fortalecer el negocio, ya que de él puede ofrecer a su familia una mejor condición.
texts.en:
Estela sells plated jewelry and lotions.  She’s 36 years old, married and has three children.  One of them is attending university and helps her with her sales; the other two are minors and don’t attend school yet.  She started the business five years ago and works via catalogues Monday through Friday.

She is asking for a loan to buy jewelry like bracelets, earrings, chains and lotions.  This purchase will help her increase inventory to earn better income because she’ll buy at wholesale thus obtaining better prices.  Estela’s goal is to strengthen the business because from it she can offer her family a better condition.

loans.use: to buy jewelry and lotions.

loans.name: Julio Alfredo

texts.es:
Julio, se dedica a la venta de sorbete, vive con su hija de 14 años de edad, él ha logrado mantenerse con el negocio a través de préstamos, mucho esfuerzo y trabajo, por eso solicita un préstamo para seguir creciendo en el negocio, actualmente tiene una venta de helados, pero anteriormente ha tenido varias ocupaciones como vendedor de mariscos, zapatero, panadero, siempre buscando las alternativas para tener dinero de manera honrada.
Él solicita este préstamo poder quiere invertirlo en sorbetes de varios sabores, paletas, conos, vasitos, que son los necesarios para mantener siempre a los clientes, con esto espera mejorar su servicio y de las ganancias sacar a su hija adelante. 
El objetivo de Julio es trabajar fuerte para aumentar sus ingresos, mejorar la vivienda y apoyar a su hija en sus estudios de bachiller.
texts.en:
Julio sells frozen treats.  He lives with his 14 year old daughter.  He’s managed to stay in business through loans, much effort and work.  This is why he’s asking for a loan to continue growing in business.  He currently sells ice-cream but he’s had many occupations like seafood merchant, shoe maker and baker.  He’s always looking for ways to earn honest income.

He is asking for this loan to invest in sorbets in assorted flavors, popsicles, ice-cream cones and small drinking glasses that are necessary to retain customers always.  With this he hopes to improve service and profits to move his daughter forward.

Julio’s objective is to work hard to increase income, to improve his house and to support his daughter with her high school studies.

loans.use: to buy sorbets, popsicles, ice-cream cones and small drinking glasses.

loans.name: Zenelia Elvira Baca Munguia

texts.es: Zenelia Elvira esta emprendedora ya es cliente de Fundación León 2000, con el crédito que se le ha otorgado la emprendedora ha invertido en su negocio aumentando su mercadería para ofrecerles a sus clientes variedad de producto. Esta emprendedora está contenta con el apoyado que le están brindando para crecer en su negocio y abastecer a sus clientes que son su prioridad de satisfacerlos. Actualmente la emprendedora está solicitando financiamiento para comprar más producto como polvos, estuches, bolsos, sabanas, brillos, tratamientos, perfumes entre otros productos.
texts.en: The entrepreneur Zenelia Elvira is already a client of Fundación León 2000. With the loan she has been awarded, she has invested in her business by increasing her merchandise so that she can offer her customers a variety of products. She is happy with the support she is receiving to help her business grow and to supply her customers, since her priority is to satisfy them. Currently, the entrepreneur is requesting financing to purchase more products such as powders, cases, handbags, sheets, glosses, treatments, and perfumes, among other products.

loans.use: to purchase products such as powders, cases, handbags, sheets, glosses, treatments, and perfumes, among other products.

loans.name: Fenou Group

texts.fr: Le groupe FENOU est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. C'est la troisième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Videva Pierrette est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Videva Pierrette est âgée de 29 ans et vit au Bénin. Videva Pierrette a arrêté l'école au niveau secondaire. Videva Pierrette est célibataire sans enfant. Afin de subvenir à ses besoins, Videva Pierrette mène comme activité depuis dix ans, la vente de tissus et des friperies dans une ville du Benin. Videva Pierrette s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Videva Pierrette sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe FENOU, un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les deux premiers prêts ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The group FENOU is composed of three persons who reside in the same district. This is the third time this group has requested financial aid from ALIDé for boosting their business. The group's representative, Videva Pierrette, is the one in the photo with her hand raised. She is 29 years old and lives in Benin. She halted her studies in secondary school, is unmarried, and has no children. 

To support herself, Videva Pierrette has had a business for ten years selling fabrics and used clothing in a city in Benin. She gets her supplies  from a market in Benin. 

Seeking to satisfy her customers and to increase her sales and her revenues, Videva Pierrette is requesting, along with the other members of the group FENOU, a third loan from ALIDé. The first two loan were indeed paid back.

loans.use: to buy cloth and second-hand clothing

loans.name: Orlando Edward Fuentes Huamani

texts.es:
Orlando es un hombre de 40 años que vive en la ciudad de Ica, Perú, la misma que es reconocida a nivel nacional por la permanente intensidad del sol que nos acompaña todo el año. En esta ciudad, que se ha desarrollado económicamente en los últimos años, la misma que da la bienvenida a los microempresarios, se encuentra la historia de Orlando, un hombre que se dedica a la construcción.

Él es un hombre que trabaja un promedio de 8 a 10 horas diarias, tiempo en el que brinda distintos a servicios, a diferentes clientes. Con el tiempo Orlando a logrado en hacerse conocido por las recomendaciones que sus clientes les dan a sus conocidos, y el está seguro que es así por el buen servicio que les brinda.

Con ayuda de Kiva en la difusión de su historia, Orlando podrá adquirir una moto lineal, lo que le permitirá transportarse fácilmente con sus herramientas, de este modo podrá ahorrar la movilidad que necesita diariamente. El sabe que esto podrá permitirle trasladarse a zonas más alejadas y ahorrarse el transporte, considera que podrá tener mayores ingresos. En algunos meses desea poder formalizar el servicio que brinda y con las nuevas ganancias que obtenga desea cumplir su gran sueño Comprarse su propia camioneta.
texts.en:
Orlando is a 40 year old man who lives in the city of Ica, Perú, a city known throughout Perú for the continual intensity of sun that accompanies its residents all year long. In this city that has developed economically in the last few years and that welcomes microentrepreneurs, we find the story of Orlando, a man who earns his living in construction.

Orlando is a man who works an average of 8 to 10 hours daily. During that time he provides different services to different clients. Over time, Orlando has successfully earned a good reputation through the recommendations his clients give to the people they know. He is certain that he has earned that good reputation through the excellent service that he gives to his clients.

With Kiva's help spreading the word about Orlando, he will be able to buy a motorcycle, which will allow him to easily transport himself and his tools to work. With the motorcycle he will have the mobility he needs daily. He knows that having his own transportation will allow him to work in areas that are further away and will allow him to get there easily. He believes that he will be able to increase his earnings. In a few months, Orlando wants to be able to formalize the services that he offers to his clients. With the new income he will earn, he hopes to fulfill his dream of buying himself his own small truck.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle to transport himself and his tools to his clients' sites.

loans.name: Dinia Mora Porras

texts.es: Dinia tiene la edad  de 30 años, está casada,  vive con sus  hijos y su esposo que son su mayor prioridad. Ella con el crédito pretende comprar los insumos para asistir su café como lo son los plaguicidas, abonos y otros más. El esposo de ella cuenta con un área ya en producción que necesita asistir para aumentar su cosecha este próximo año. Ella quiere ayudarle a su esposo con la plantación y así obtener de esta mejores resultados de producción y mejorar el bienestar económico de la familia para vivir en mejor condición  y aumentar las ganancias cada día. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Dinia, 30, is married and lives with her children and her husband who are her main priority.  She intends to use the loan to buy farm supplies for her coffee crops like bug killers, manure and others.  

Her husband has a tract of land already under production that needs assistance to increase production this next year.  She wants to help her husband with the plantation and obtain better production results and to improve the family’s economic wellbeing so that they can live in better conditions and increase profits each day.

This is the first loan she’s gotten from Fudecosur.   She’s had no previous loans from state banks but Fudecosur has offered a loan with the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies for her coffee crops.

loans.name: Fabian Guillermo Artola Acosta

texts.es: Fabián Guillermo, tiene la edad de 27 años,  vive en unión libre, y tiene una  hija que es su mayor prioridad. El quiere  comprar Semilla de Café y abonos para hacer un almacigal para venderlo cuando está de trasplantar. No tiene mucha experiencia pero tiene  mucho deseo de superarse económicamente. Es el primer  préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. También, el no ha realizado otros préstamos en bancos estatales o Cooperativas pero FUDECOSUR le brindó el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de interés es mucho más baja. El  también tiene el deseo de brindarle a su hija la educación necesaria  para que sea en el futuro una persona preparada y pueda enfrentar de manera más fácil la vida.
texts.en:
Fabián Guillermo, 27, has a spouse and a daughter who is his main priority.  He wants to buy coffee seeds and manure to create seedlings to sell when they are ready to be transplanted.  He does not have much experience but he does have a strong wish to improve economically.

This is the first loan he’s gotten from Fudecosur and he’s also never had loans from state banks or cooperatives but Fudecosur offered the loan with the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

He also wants to provide his daughter with the necessary education so that she will be well-prepared in the future and able to face life more easily.

loans.use: to buy coffee seeds and manure.

loans.name: Gerardina Retana Espinoza

texts.es: Gerardina, tiene la edad  de 35 años, está casada,  vive con sus dos hijos y su esposo  actualmente. El con el crédito pretende comprar insumos para el mantenimiento del café como abonos, hervidas, foliares, e invertir en mono de obra  y así poder obtener el máximo de  producción de la plantación de café, así poder  obtener más ganancias  para obtener una mejor calidad de vida para ella y de su familia y una estabilidad económica. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Gerardina, 35, is married and lives with her two children and her husband at present.  She intends to use the loan to buy farm supplies for her coffee crops like manure, herbicides, leaf fertilizer as well as to pay for labor costs to obtain the maximum production from her coffee plantation thus obtaining more profits for better living conditions and economic stability for her and her family.

This is the first loan she’s gotten from Fudecosur.   She’s had no previous loans from state banks but Fudecosur has offered a loan with the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies for her coffee crops.

location.town: El Ceibo, San Vito, Coto Brus

loans.name: Senami Group

texts.fr: Le groupe SENAMI est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. C'est la deuxième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Dédé Virginie Paula est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Dédé Virginie Paula est âgée de 42 ans et vit au Bénin. Dédé Virginie Paula n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Dédé Virginie Paula est mariée à un certain Bertin. Le couple a quatre enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Dédé Virginie Paula vit ensemble avec son mari et ses  enfants et assure ensemble avec son mari les charges de la maison. Afin d'assurer les diverses charges de la famille, Dédé Virginie Paula vend depuis vingt ans, de l’igname, des conserves et des savons dans son quartier. Dédé Virginie Paula s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Dédé Virginie Paula sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe SENAMI, un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Le premier prêt a été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
The group SENAMI comprises three persons who reside in the same district. This is the second time this group has requested financial aid from ALIDé for boosting their business. The group's representative, Dédé Virginie Paula, is the one in the photo with her hand raised. She is 42 years old and lives in Benin. She did not attend school. She is married to a man named Bertin. The have four children, all in school and in their care. Dédé Virginie Paula lives together with her husband and children and ensures, along with her husband, that the household expenses are covered. 

To ensure family expenses are covered, Dédé Virginie Paula has been selling yams, canned foods, and soaps for twenty years in her district. She gets her supplies from a market in Benin. 

Seeking to satisfy her customers and to increase her sales and her revenues, Dédé Virginie Paula is requesting, along with the other members of the group SENAMI, a second loan from ALIDé. The first loan was indeed paid back.

loans.use: to buy canned foods, soap, and yams

loans.name: Geiner Duarte Calderón

texts.es: Geiner, tiene la edad de 41 años,  Está casado y vive con su esposa y sus 4 hijos de los cuales 3 son estudiantes, ellos son  su mayor prioridad. El quiere  comprar  Novillos para engordarlos, venderlos y aumentar sus ganancias. Siempre se ha dedicado a la crianza de ganado, por lo que tiene mucha experiencia, tiene  mucho deseo de superarse económicamente. Es el primer  préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. También, el no ha realizados otros préstamos en bancos estatales o Cooperativas pero FUDECOSUR le brindó el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de interés es mucho más baja. El  también tiene el deseo de brindarle a sus  hijos la educación necesaria  para que sean en el futuro  personas  preparadas y puedan enfrentar de manera más fácil la vida.
texts.en:
Geiner, 41, is married and lives with his wife and four children three of which are students and his main priority.  He wants to buy calves to fatten up, sell them and increase his profits.  He’s always worked raising cattle so he has much experience and a strong desire to improve himself economically.

This is the first loan he’s gotten from Fudecosur and he’s also never had loans from state banks or cooperatives but Fudecosur offered the loan with the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

He also wants to provide his children with the necessary education so that they will be well-prepared in the future and able to face life more easily.
.

loans.use: to buy calves to fatten up.

loans.name: Beleida Cordero Zuñiga

texts.es: Beleida, tiene la edad  de 40 años, está casada,  vive con sus dos hijos y su esposo  actualmente. Ella con el crédito pretende comprar ropa intima de hombre y mujer y además ropa deportiva. Ella tiene pensado comprar mucha variedad de ropa para poder tener una mejor rotación, así poder venderla a un excelente precio al mercado de la localidad y poder  obtener más ganancias  para obtener una mejor calidad de vida y una estabilidad económica de ella y su familia. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Beleida, 40, is married and living with her two children and her husband at present.  She intends to use the loan to buy underwear for men and women as well as sportswear.  She’s thinking about buying a wide variety of clothes in order to have a successful turnaround and be able to sell it at an excellent price to the local market thus obtaining more profits to obtain a better quality of life and economic stability for her and her family.


This is the first loan she’s gotten from Fudecosur and she’s also never had loans from state banks but Fudecosur offered the loan with the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

location.town: El Ceibo, San Vito, Coto Brus

loans.name: Lelianita

texts.en: Lelianita, 44 years old and married, has been raising pigs in the Philippines for six years. Having borrowed and repaid 14 previous loans from NWTF, Lelianita is now requesting a PHP 15000 loan to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Adjeniya Group

texts.fr: Le groupe ADJENIYA est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. C'est la deuxième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Adjaratou est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Adjaratou est âgée de 41 ans et est mariée à un matelassier du nom de Saka. Adjaratou n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Le couple a quatre enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Adjaratou vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple se partage les différentes charges de la maison. Pour contribuer aux différents besoins de la famille, Adjaratou vend depuis huit ans des produits cosmétiques et des ustensiles de cuisine. De façon secondaire, Adjaratou vend de la farine de manioc à son domicile. Cette activité lui permet de répondre sans grande difficulté à ses besoins. Adjaratou s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Adjaratou sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe ADJENIYA, un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Le premier  prêt a été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
The group ADJENIYA comprises three persons who reside in the same district. This is the second time this group has requested financial aid from ALIDé for boosting their business. The group's representative, Adjaratou, is the one in the photo with her hand raised. She is 41 years old and married to a mattress maker named Saka. Adjaratou did not attend school. The couple have four children, all in school and in their care. She lives together with her husband and children. The couple share in the different household expenses. 

To help meet the different needs of the family, Adjaratou has been selling cosmetics and kitchen utensils for eight years. On the side, she sells cassava flour out of her home. This work enables her to support herself without much difficulty. She gets her supplies from a market in Benin. 

Seeking to satisfy her customers and increase her sales and her revenues, Adjaratou is requesting, along with the other members of the group ADJENIYA, a second loan from ALIDé. The first loan was indeed paid back.

loans.use: to buy cosmetic products and kitchen utensils

loans.name: Irma

texts.es: Irma es socia del Banco Comunal Agua Viva, tiene 30 años, es madre de 4 hijos, es socia de Finca Perú desde hace 6 meses, se dedica a la venta de frutas y abarrotes, el poco tiempo que esta puede ver que la metodología que tiene Finca es muy buena porque sus ahorros están creciendo y los préstamos le ayudan a aumentar su mercadería. Ahora con el préstamo lo invertirá en al compra de abarrotes.
texts.en: Irma is a member of the “Agua Viva” (Living Water) communal bank.  She’s 30 years old and the mother of four children.  She’s been a member of Finca Perú for six months.  She sells fruit and groceries.  In the short time she’s been here she can see that Finca’s methodology is very good because her savings are growing and the loans help her increase her merchandise.  Now, she will use the loan to buy groceries.

loans.use: to buy groceries.

loans.name: María Elena Arias Jiménez

texts.es: María Elena, tiene la edad de 46 años,  vive en unión libre. Ella quiere  comprar  abono e insumos para mantenimiento de caña y aumentar sus ganancias. Siempre se ha dedicado junto con su compañero a la producción de caña, la cual venden a una Cooperativa, por lo que tiene mucha experiencia, tiene  mucho deseo de superarse económicamente. Es el primer  préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. También, ella  no ha realizado otros préstamos en bancos estatales o Cooperativas pero FUDECOSUR le brindó el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de interés es mucho más baja. Su deseo es mejorar los ingresos para tener una mejor forma de vida.
texts.en:
María Elena, 46, is in a common law relationship.  She wants to buy manure and supplies for sugarcane crop maintenance and to increase her profits.  She and her spouse have always been dedicated to sugarcane production that they sell to a cooperative so she has much experience and very much wants to improve economically.

This is the first loan received from Fudecosur.  She’s had no previous loans form state banks or cooperatives but Fudecosur offered her a loan with the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

Her wish is to improve income in order to have a better way of life.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies and manure for her sugarcane crops.

loans.name: Alexander Jimenez  Salazar

texts.es: Alexander, tiene la edad  de 40 años, está casado,  vive con sus dos hijos  actualmente. El con el crédito pretende comprar herramientas  de construcción para ayudarse y facilitar el trabajo, El tiene pensado comprar martillos, herramientas para sacar niveles, escuadras, carretillo y muchas cosas más, y así poder trabajar de una mejor forma y mas eficiente, así poder  obtener más ganancias  para obtener una mejor calidad de vida y una estabilidad económica. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Alexander, 40, is married living with his two children at present.  He intends to use the loan to buy building tools to help him make his work easier.  He plans to buy hammers, carpenter levels, squares, wheelbarrows and many other things so that he can work in better and more efficient manner thus obtaining more profits to attain better quality of life and economic stability.

This is the first loan received from Fudecosur.  He’s had no previous loans form state banks but Fudecosur offered him a loan with the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy tools.

location.town: El Ceibo, San Vito, Coto Brus

loans.name: Rubidia Milagro

texts.es:
Rubidia, vive con una hija y dos nietos, se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, ella aprendió el negocio por cuenta propia, desde hace 7 años, poco a poco ha ido adquiriendo experiencia.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de frutas y verduras frescas, como manzanas, papayas, fresas, tomates, cebollas, repollo, esta inversión le ayudara para mejorar la disponibilidad en el negocio, manteniendo  surtido para atender la demanda.
La aspiración de Rubidia es mejorar cada día con el negocio, agregar nuevos productos para crecer y ofrecer a su familia mejores oportunidades de superar.
texts.en:
Rubidia lives with her daughter and two grandchildren. She sells fruits and vegetables. She learned this business on her own over the last seven years, and has been picking up experience little by little since then.
She is requesting a loan to purchase fresh fruits and vegetables, like apples, papayas, strawberries, tomatoes, onions, and cabbage. This investment will help her to improve availability in her business, allowing her to maintain a variety of stock to meet her customers’ demands.
Rubidia’s aspiration is to improve her business every day, adding new products so her business can grow, and offering her family better opportunities to get ahead.

loans.use: to purchase apples, papayas, strawberries, and tomatoes.

loans.name: Maria Cordelia

texts.es:
María, vive con sus hijos, es ama de casa, pero junto a sus hijos desarrolla la agricultura, sembrando maíz, pipián, frijol, ajonjolí, esto lo aprendió de su esposo, aunque ahora solo lo realiza con sus hijos.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos para realizar la siembra, el abono, herbicidas, alquilando y  preparando la tierra donde se dispone a desarrollar el cultivo, este préstamo le ayudara para tener todo lo necesario para el cultivo.
El objetivo de María es seguir realizando los cultivos con la ayuda de sus hijos,  de esta manera asegura la alimentación de todos, tambien a futuro quiere mejorar las instalaciones de la vivienda.
texts.en:
Maria is a housewife who lives with her children. She has a farm that she runs with her children. They cultivate corn, chili peppers, beans, and sesame. She learned from her husband, but now only farms with her children.
She is requesting a loan to purchase cultivation supplies, fertilizer, and herbicides, as well as to cover rent payments and the cost of land preparation where she will cultivate her crops. This loan will help her to have everything she needs for the crops.
Maria’s goal is continue raising crops with the help of her children, which will assure that they all will have food to eat. Additionally, in the future she wants to improve her living facilities.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and herbicides, as well as to cover rent payments and land preparation costs.

loans.name: Maria Segunda

texts.es:
María, tiene 40 años de edad, vive con su esposo y tres hijos, de las edades de 11, 6 y un año y medio, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas, aprendió hace tres años, lo realiza por la necesidad de tener más ingresos para la alimentación y el estudio de sus hijos, su horario es de 10:00am a 4:00pm.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de maíz y leña, con estos materiales que mantenga en el negocio, lograra mantener la producción de las tortillas y que sus clientes puedan encontrar con seguridad este alimento.
Los sueños de María es ver crecer sanos a sus hijos, poderles ayudar en sus estudios.
texts.en: María is 40 and lives with her husband and 3 children, who are 11, 6, and 1 1/2.  She makes a living selling tortillas, which she learned how to do 3 years ago.  She does this because of the need to have more income to feed and educate their children.  Her schedule is from 10 a.m. to 4 p.m.  She is requesting a loan to buy more corn and firewood.  With these materials, she will be able to maintain her business and her production of tortillas so her customers can count on finding this food.  María's dream is to see her children grow up healthily and to be able to help them with their studies.

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood.

loans.name: Joan

texts.en:
This is Joan, a 34-year-old resident of Bacoor, Cavite City, Philippines, who is married to Rod, her business partner, and a mother to her five children. She and her husband manage their household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Joan operates a junk shop. Trash is not actively segregated in the Philippines, and while waiting for their local dump trucks, people scavenge garbage dumps and trash bags for recyclable materials like metal, copper, plastic, paper and other materials. They sell these to junk shops for a little profit. Junk shops then stack, clean, and gather huge quantities of these materials and sell them back to foundries such as factories and the like. Joan's regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of Php 500 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, Joan is requesting a Php 14,000 loan to buy recyclable materials from collectors. She expects a boost in her income as she expands her business.

Joan hopes her business grows more in the coming years. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners who gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for recyclable materials needed in her business.

loans.name: Leonisa

texts.en:
Leonisa is from Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. She is 29 years old. Leonisa is married and has six children.

To make a living, Leonisa plants, harvests, and sells rice. She has been in her business for six years and earns 3,000 PHP a month from these activities.

In 2008, Leonisa joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Leonisa is requesting a new loan of 6,000 PHP, which will be used to pay for the labor costs and maintenance of the farm. 

She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to pay for the labor costs and maintenance of the farm.

location.town: Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Corazon Bordaje

texts.en:
Corazon is 60 years old and married with eight children.

Corazon works hard to provide for her family. She runs a dry goods retail business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 40,000 loan through NWTF to buy assorted dry goods to sell.

Corazon has borrowed and paid fourteen loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the dry goods retail business for nineteen years and also earns an income from raising pigs.

Corazon aspires to save enough to buy a sugarcane farm.

loans.use: to buy assorted dry goods to sell.

loans.name: Wangninangbe Group

texts.fr: WANGNINANGBE est un groupe constitué de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier et dont la représentante (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) se nomme Pauline. Dans le but d’augmenter leur fonds de roulement, ce groupe sollicite pour la troisième fois, un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Pauline est âgée de 44 ans et est mariée à un certain Eric. Le couple a quatre enfants, dont deux sont à leur charge. Tous les enfants sont scolarisés. Pauline n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Pour satisfaire ses besoins et ceux de sa famille, Pauline vend du maïs dans un marché du Benin depuis près de sept ans. Pauline s’approvisionne au Benin. Ce troisième prêt leur permettra de rehausser le niveau de leur activité et d’accroître leur clientèle et leur revenu. les deux prêts consentis antérieurement ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The group WANGNINANGBE consists of three people who live in the same neighborhood and whose representative is Pauline, seen with her hand raised in the photo. This is the group’s third time seeking financial assistance from ALIDé to increase their working capital. 

Pauline, age 44, is married to a man named Eric. The couple have four children, two of them still in their care. All have received schooling. Pauline herself never went to school.

In order to help support herself and her family, Pauline has been selling maize at a market of Benin for almost seven years. She buys her stock in Benin. 

This third loan will help the group members to bolster their activities, to expand their customer base, and to increase their revenue. Both previous loans were repaid correctly.

loans.use: to buy bags of maize.

loans.name: Adjo

texts.fr:
Adjo est une femme âgée de vingt-neuf ans. Elle est mariée à un soudeur ferrailleur. Elle a un enfant, qui a deux ans et demi.  
Adjo travaille comme tresseuse depuis 2007. Elle tresse et vend des mèches pour toutes personnes dans sa boutique. 
Adjo a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’investir dans le commerce. Elle veut utiliser les profits supplémentaires pour recréer une autre entreprise. 
Dans les prochaines années, Adjo voudrait faire une multiplication du commerce en ajoutant d`autres produits tel que les pommades. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit  une vie meilleure.
texts.en:
Adjo is a 29-year-old woman who is married to an iron welder. She has one child, who is 2½ years old. Adjo has been working as a hair stylist since 2007. She braids hair and sells hair extensions to all comers at her salon. 

Adjo has requested her first loan from WAGES for investing in her business. She wants to use the extra profits to create another enterprise.

In the next few years, Adjo would like to expand her business by adding other products, such as ointments. She says she will use the profits for a better life.

loans.use: to buy hair extensions

loans.name: Akossiwa

texts.fr:
Akossiwa est une femme âgée de soixante-un ans. Elle est mariée à un éleveur. Elle a quatre enfants, dont deux sont à l’école. Le premier a 40 ans et le dernier a dix-huit ans.  
Akossiwa travaille comme revendeuse depuis 1992. Elle vend des pagnes et bijoux pour toutes personnes servis au marché.  Il n`y a aucune difficultés pour son entreprise.
Akossiwa a requis son troisième crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des pagnes et bijoux. Elle veut faire des épargnes avec ses profits supplémentaires. 
Dans les prochaines années, Akossiwa voudrait avoir sa propre boutique. Elle dit qu’avec des profits, elle prévoit de s`occuper de l`éducation de ses enfants qui sont à l`école.
texts.en:
Akossiwa is a 61-year-old woman who is married to a livestock farmer. She has four children, of whom two are in school. The first child is 40 years old, and the last is 18. Akossiwa has been working as a retailer since 1992. She sells <i>pagnes<i/> (colorful West African cloth) and jewelry to all comers at the market. Her enterprise is undergoing no difficulties at all. 

Akossiwa has requested her third loan from WAGES for buying <i>pagne<i/> cloth and jewelry. She wants have a savings account with the extra profits. 

In the next few years, she would like to have her own store. She says she will use the profits to take care of the education of her children in school.

loans.use: to buy traditional fabrics and some jewelry

loans.name: Responsables De Collique Group

texts.es:
La Sra. Leandra Brigitth, tiene 19 años de edad, tiene un pequeño hijo, el cual cría sola y a pesar de ser muy joven aún asume la responsabilidad de los gastos de su pequeño hijo. Ella forma parte del grupo "Los Responsables de Collique", integrado por 6 socios.
Leandra Brigitth, desde hace cuatro años se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza por catálogo, ofrece sus productos a sus familiares y amistades, poco a poco ha ido aumentando sus clientes ya que ellos recomiendas a otras personas.
Utilizará el crédito para invertir en la compra de productos de belleza que se encuentrten en oferta en los catalogos y así poder aumentar su stock de productos que pfrecerá a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Leandra Brigitth, 19, has a small son she raises alone and despite being very young she assumes responsibility for her little boy’s expenses.  She’s part of the “Los Responsables de Collique” (Collique’s Responsible Ones) communal bank which has six members.  

For the last four years Leandra Brigitth has been selling beauty products via catalogue.  She sells her products to family members and acquaintances.  She’s gradually increased her clientele because they recommend her to others.

She will use the loan to buy beauty products that are on special in the catalogues to increase the stock of products she’ll offer to her customers.

loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: Juana Orochena Calderon

texts.es: Juana es una emprendedora muy luchadora que ha salido adelante con su negocio que día a día busca nuevos productos que le solicitan sus clientes que la visitan en su negocio que lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitación. Esta emprendedora ya ha venido trabajando con Fundación León 2000, la emprendedora nos expresa que con el apoyo que ha tenido ha mejorado su negocio ya que le ofrece a sus clientes variedad de producto. Actualmente la emprendedora está solicitando financiamiento para invertir en la pulpería en la que comprara productos como granos básicos, golosinas, refrescos, pan, detergentes, jabón, café, entre otros productos.
texts.en: Juana is a very tenacious entrepreneur who has gotten ahead with her business and every day seeks out new products that customers who visit her store located in her house request.  This entrepreneur has already been working with Fundación León 2000 and she states that with the support she’s gotten she’s improved her business since she now offers her customers more variety of products.  She is currently asking for a loan to invest in the grocery store buying such products as basic grains, snacks, soft-drinks, bread, detergent, soap and coffee, among others.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Reyna Patricia Velásquez Castillo

texts.es:
Reyna Patricia se dedica a la actividad de docencia en una comunidad cercana al municipio de El Sauce desde hace muchos años, es una persona de buenas costumbres la cual les enseña a los niños de todas las edades, Es madre de un niño el cual lo está preparando para que sea profesional y persona de bien para la sociedad.

Actualmente, está solicitando un crédito para mejorar su vivienda para la construcción de un dormitorio con el objetivo de tener más espacio y comodidad en su hogar el cual será invertido exclusivamente en la compra de materiales como  ladrillos, zinc y una puerta, esperando y confiando en Dios poder lograr sus planes con la ayuda de Ceprodel.
texts.en:
Reyna Patricia  has been earning her living as a teacher in a community close to the city of El Sauce for many years. She is a person of good manners who teaches those habits to children of all ages. She is the mother of a young boy and is raising him to be a professional and a person who contributes to society. 

Currently, Reyna is requesting a loan with which to improve her home. She wants to build a bedroom in order to have more space and more comfort in her home. The loan will be used exclusively in the purchase of construction materials such as bricks, zinc and a door. She is hoping for success and trusting in God that she will be able to bring her plans to reality with the help of Kiva's partner, Ceprodel.

loans.use: To buy bricks, zinc and a door.

loans.name: Consuelo Elizabeth Gomez Espinoza

texts.es:
Consuelo es una joven muy alegre, optimista y sobre todo trabajadora, su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Nazca, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener uno de los atractivos turísticos más importantes del país, el cual son las líneas de Nazca, los cuales son dibujos extensos en un campo de tierra, los cuales según estudios habrían servido como una especie de calendario para las lluvias usado por la cultura Nazca.  Cuando dispone de tiempo de libre Consuelo disfruta de escuchar música y sobre todo aprovecha la oportunidad de comer uno de sus platos favoritos el cual el riquísimo “Arroz con pollo”; ella solo tuvo estudios secundarios debido a los pocos recursos económicos de sus padres, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Secretariado.

Con mucho optimismo Consuelo sale a trabajar día a día en su negocio de venta de celulares, accesorios y recargas virtuales; le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 9 horas diarias, como es muy alegre ella siempre le regala una sonrisa a sus clientes y siempre gracias a ello sus clientes le compran sus productos y por ello ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque atiende a sus clientes de manera muy amable.

Consuelo está muy agradecida con los prestatarios kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá comprar más mercadería (celulares, accesorios, recargas), lo que le permitirá tener más variedad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes, así podrá mejorar sus ingresos y seguir luchando cada día por ver realizado su gran sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Consuelo is a very cheerful, optimistic and above all hardworking young woman.  Her house is located in the city of Nazca, a city noted for having one of the country’s most important tourist attractions: the Nazca Lines, which are extensive drawings in a field that according to studies might have served as a type of rainfall calendar used by the Nazca culture.   

When Consuelo has any free time she enjoys listening to music and take advantage of the opportunity to enjoy one of her favorite dishes which is the very delicious “Arroz con Pollo.” She only attended secondary school due to the poor economic resources of her parents but she would have liked to have studied to be a secretary.

With much optimism, Consuelo goes out to work every day in her business selling mobile phones, accessories and virtual recharges.  She spends about 9 hours daily at work.  Because she’s so cheerful, she always has a smile to give her customers and thanks to that they buy her products.  This is why she believes she does well in her business because she tends to her customers in a very kind way.

Consuelo is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support they’ve given her she will be able to buy more merchandise (mobile phones, accessories and recharges) which will allow her to have more variety of products to offer her customers and thus improve income to continue striving toward making her great dream a reality:  “To own a house.”

loans.use: to buy mobile phones, accessories and chargers.

loans.name: Karim

texts.ru: Карим женат имеет двух детей. Жена  домохозяйка. Боле 10 лет он занимается выращиванием лука, ячменя, огурцов и арбуза. Это очень прибыльный бизнес. Он единственный человек, работающий в семье. Он старается содержать семью в достатке. Он работает не покладая рук. Он запрашивает займ в размере 7000 сомони для покупки ГСМ, минеральных удобрений и семян. Он надеется на вашу помощь и поддержку.
texts.en: Karim is married and has two children. His wife is a homemaker. For more than ten years he has been growing onions, barley, cucumbers, and watermelon. This is a very profitable business. He is the only family member who works, and he is trying to provide well for them. He works tirelessly. He is requesting a loan of 7000 somons to buy petroleum products, mineral fertilizers, and seeds, and is looking forward to your help and support.

loans.use: To buy seeds, mineral fertilizers, fuel and lubricants

loans.name: Fakhridin

texts.ru: Фахридин трудолюбивый, добрый и честный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет трех несовершеннолетних детей. Более 8 лет Фахридин занимается выращивает сельхозкультур и купле- продажей скота. В бизнесе помогают сын и жена. Он хочет расширить свой бизнес и получив большую прибыль он планирует ремонтировать свой дом, чтобы улучшить благосостояние семьи. Фахридин запрашивает займ в размере 10000 Сомони для покупки семян, минеральных удобрений и скота. Фахридин надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Fakhridin is a hard-working, kind and honest man. He is married and is raising three young children. For more than eight years Fakhridrin  has been growing produce and raising livestock. His wife and son help out with the business. He wants to expand his business and, after receiving more income, plans to repair his house to improve his family's living conditions. Fakhridrin is requesting a loan of 10,000 somons to buy seeds, mineral fertilizers, and livestock. He is looking forward to your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy seeds, mineral fertilizers and cattle

loans.name: Akram

texts.ru: Акрам женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей из них один несовершеннолетний. Более 20 лет Акрам занимается выращиванием овощей, зерновых культур и виноградоводством. Одновременно занимается купле- продажей скота. Он  откармливает скот до набора  определенного веса. В бизнесе помогают его любящие сыновья и супруга. Акрам запрашивает займ в размере 2000 Сомони для покупки крупного рогатого скота. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Akram is married and is raising three children, one of whom is very young. For more than 20 years Akram has been raising vegetables, grain, and grapes for winemaking. He also raises livestock; he fattens them until they reach a certain weight. His loving son and wife help him with the business. Akram is asking for a loan of 2000 Somons to buy cattle. He looks forward to your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Ami

texts.fr:
Ami est une femme âgée de trente-cinq ans. Elle est mariée à un mécanicien d`automobiles. Elle a trois enfants, dont deux sont à l’école. Le premier a douze ans et le dernier a neuf mois.  
Ami travaille comme revendeuse depuis 2005. Elle vend du charbon de bois pour toutes personnes dans sa maison dans un quartier de la place.
Ami a requis son troisième crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter du charbon de bois. Elle veut réinvestir dans le commerce ses profits supplémentaires. 
Dans les prochaines années, Ami voudrait élargir l`activité et, avec ses profits, elle prévoit d`améliorer le niveau de vie de sa famille
texts.en:
Ami is a 35-year-old woman who is married to an automobile mechanic. She has three children, of whom two are in school. The first child is 12 years old, and the last is 9 months old. Ami has been working as a retailer since 2005. She sells charcoal to anyone at her house in a local neighborhood. 

Ami has requested her third loan from WAGES to buy some charcoal. She wants to reinvest the extra profits into her business. 

In the next few years, she would like to expand her business, and she plans on using the profits to improve her family's living situation.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal

loans.name: Reinaldo Abarca Mora

texts.es:
Reinaldo es un señor de 48 años de edad y vive con su familia, en una comunidad de la zona Sur de Costa Rica, ubicada en Concepción de Pilas, Puntarenas. La economía local está basada en actividades agropecuarias, donde destaca la siembra de tubérculos, café, maíz, frijoles y ganadería.
Reinaldo está solicitando un préstamo de un millón de colones  (¢1.000.000), para darle mantenimiento a su cultivo de frijoles y para comprar algunas herramientas agrícolas, necesita comprar insumos agrícolas como abono y fungicidas para proteger sus cultivos de frijol de cualquier  daño .  También aumentará la capacidad que posee el suelo de absorber los distintos elementos nutritivos y con los fungicidas que utilizará gracias a este préstamo también logrará evitar  que aparezcan hongos en sus plantaciones, para que luego sean consumidos con toda seguridad. Además  brindará productos de calidad a sus clientes, alcanzará la meta de producción que se ha propuesto, por otra parte ayudará económicamente a su familia.
Reinaldo es socio de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal de la Danta S.A, una de las 150 empresas de crédito comunal de Costa Rica.
texts.en:
Reinaldo is a 48 year old man living with his family in a community in the south of Costa Rica located in Concepción de Pilas, Puntarenas.  The local economy is based on farming and livestock raising where planting tubers, coffee, corn, beans and cattle raising predominate.

Reinaldo is asking for a one-million colones loan (¢1.000.000) to provide crop maintenance to the bean crops and to buy some farm tools he needs.  He needs to buy farm supplies like manure and fungicide to protect his bean crops from damage.  He will also increase the capacity the soil has for absorbing nutritional elements and with the fungicides he’ll use thanks to this loan he will also manage to avoid fungal growth in his plants so that they can be consumed safely.  In addition, he will provide quality products to his customers, will reach the production goals he’s set for himself and on the other hand will help his family economically.

Reinaldo is a member of the La Danta S.A. communal bank, one of Costa Rica’s 150 communal credit firms.

loans.use: to purchase compost, herbicides, and insecticides.

loans.name: Julliors Stewart Loyola Ramirez

texts.es:
Julliors es un joven muy entusiasta que con su esfuerzo y dedicación ha encontrado siempre la manera de salir adelante y progresar constantemente. En los momentos que no labora, disfruta mucho escuchar la música. La vivienda de Julliors y sus padres se encuentra en el distrito de Parcona , Ica, Perú. Lugar que ha sufrido de constantes movimientos telúricos y  lluvias, lo que ha ocasionado que Julliors tenga algunos percances familiares.

Este joven luchador trabaja como chofer en una moto taxi que alquila diariamente, él trabaja desde muy temprano debido a que es en esas horas donde las personas necesitan movilizarse, para ir a sus trabajos o a sus centros educativos. 

Con el apoyo que se le está brindando a Julliors, podrá realizar el pago de la cuota inicial de la moto taxi que desde hace tiempo quiere comprarse, debido a que esto le permitirá tener una mayor cantidad de ganancias, Julliors está muy contento porque de esta manera podrá trabajar muchas más horas. El está dispuesto a dar todo de sí para que este pequeño negocio que posee, poco a poco  incremente sus ingresos, es así como piensa comprar un vehículo, el cual le brindará mucha más seguridad y le permitirá viajar a lugares mucho más lejanos de la zona en la que actualmente trabaja.
texts.en:
Julliors is a very enthusiastic young man who with much effort and dedication has always found a way to get ahead and make constant progress.  When he’s not working he enjoys listening to music.  His and his parents’ house is located in Parcona District, Ica, Perú.  This is a place that has suffered constant seismic movement and rain which has caused Julliors to have some family mishaps.

This tenacious young man works driving a mototaxi that he leases daily.  He starts work very early because that’s the time people need to get around heading to their jobs or schools.

With the support Julliors is being offered he will be able to make a down payment on a mototaxi he’s wanted to buy for a long time because this will increase his profits.  Julliors is very happy because he will be able to work many more hours this way.  He is prepared to give everything of himself so that the small business he has will gradually increase his income.  This is how he plans to buy a vehicle that will offer much more safety and allow him to travel to areas much further away from the zone he works in currently.

loans.use: to pay the downpayment on a mototaxi.

loans.name: Maria Teresa Ventura Nuñez

texts.es:
Maria tiene 42 años de edad, pero parece una joven de 20 ya que es muy alegre y entusiasta, es madre de 2 pequeños de 9 y 13 años, a los cuales ama muchísimo a pesar de que de vez en cuando le sacan canas verdes ya que son muy traviesos; su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Ica, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener uno de los atractivos turísticos que acoge infinidad de turistas cada año, el cual es la laguna de “Huacachina”, asimismo se caracteriza por ser una ciudad donde se cultiva el Algodón Tangüis, el delicioso esparrago. Uno de sus pasatiempos favoritos es cocinar y sobre todo porque prepara uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es la riquísima “Carapulcra”. Debido a los pocos recursos económicos de sus padres ella solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de secundaria pero le hubiera gustado estudiar para ser profesora; es por ello que se esfuerza mucho por hacer de sus hijos unos jóvenes de bien y que sean mejores que ella.

Cada día Maria se levanta con muchos ánimos para trabajar en su negocio de alquiler de mototaxis, se dedica a su negocio alrededor de 8 horas, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque trata a sus clientes de manera amable.

Maria está muy agradecida con los prestatarios kiva ya que gracias a su ayuda ella podrá comprar puerta para su mototaxi y micas para protección, lo que le permitirá alquilar un vehículo mas seguro, así tendrá mayores ingresos y seguirá trabajando día a día para poder realizar su gran sueño:” Tener una casa grande”.
texts.en:
Maria is 42 but looks like she is 20.  She is very happy and enthusiastic.  She is the mother of 2 young children, who are 9 and 13, whom she loves very much even though sometimes they drive her to an early grave and are very ornery.  Her home is located in the city of Ica, which is known for having one of the tourist attractions that brings in infinite tourists each year, which is the Huacachina Lagoon.  It is also known for growing "Algodón Tangüis," a delicious kind of asparagus.  One of her favorite pastimes is cooking and above all making one of her favorite dishes, which is the delicious "Carapulcra."  Due to her parents' scarce economic resources, she could only study until fifth grade, but she would have liked to have studied to be a teacher.  This is why she works so hard to make her children worthy young people and so they will be better than she is.

Every day, María gets up with a lot of energy to work at her business renting motorcycle taxis.  She works at her business around 8 hours a day.  She thinks that her business is going well because she treats her customers in a very friendly manner.

María is very thankful to the Kiva lenders since thanks to their help, she will be able to buy a door and plastic windows for protection for her motorcycle taxi, which will let her rent a safer vehicle.  She will have better income and will keep working day after day to be able to fulfill her big dream: "to have a big house."

loans.use: to buy doors and plastic windows.

loans.name: Natividad Alejo De Medrano

texts.es:
Natividad, una mujer perseverante de 64 años, se ha dedicado a la venta de abarrotes desde hace aproximadamente 4 años, tiempo en el que junto a su esposo, han podido mejorar su calidad de vida poco a poco. Después de los frecuentes terremotos y lluvias intensas, han podido darse fuerzas y apoyarse mutuamente para poder mantener la calma en esos desagradables momentos.

Natividad, se dedica a la vente de menestras, fideos, leche, etc. en una pequeña bodega que se en encuentra en parte de su sala, este trabajo le ha permitido ganar el sustento diario para ella y su esposo, debido a que todos su hijos ya son mayores de edad. Natividad tiene el sueño de continuar ampliando su negocio y es por eso que se le está brindando el apoyo que necesita mediante un crédito, lo que le permitirá comprar arroz, azúcar, leche, menestras, etc. 

Con ayuda de los prestatarios Kiva, esta humilde mujer podrá salir adelante junto a su esposo de 75 años, al cual ama y cuida diariamente. Natividad desea mejorar sus ingresos con la finalidad de terminar de construir su vivienda y dejársela a sus hijos como símbolo de su esfuerzo y dedicación.
texts.en:
Natividad is a persevering woman, 64 years old. For approximately 4 years now she has run a small grocery store, during which time she and her husband have been able to improve their quality of life little by little.  After the frequent earthquakes and intense rains, they have had to be very strong and supportive of each other to maintain some tranquility during these difficult times.  

Natividad sells every day items such as noodles, milk, etc, in a small shop that she's set up in a part of their home.   This business has enabled her and her husband to earn enough to sustain them day to day.   Their children are all grown now and support themselves.  Natividad's dream is to continue to grow her business and this loan will help her with the purchase of rice, sugar, milk and other popular items.  

With the help from the Kiva loans, this humble woman can continue to sustain herself and her 75 year old husband, whom she loves and cares for daily.
